import React, { useState } from 'react' import { BackButton } from '../components/BackButton' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { addTicket } from '../../features/tickets/ticketSlice' export const NewTicket = () => { const { user } = useSelector((state) => state.auth) const { isLoading, isError, isSuccess, message } = useSelector((state) => state.ticket) const [name] = useState(user.name) const [email] = useState(user.email) const [product, setProduct] = useState('Max') const [description, setDescription] = useState(user.description) const dispatch = useDispatch() const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const newTicket = { user: user._id, email, product, description } dispatch(addTicket(newTicket)) } return ( <>
